title: Montek Singh Ahluwalia & Utkarsh Patel write: A seven-point plan to scale up our climate ambition
description: Announcing a date for peaking emissions will give credibility to our commitment to decarbonise. It will also help counter the criticism that India is the third-largest emitter and its emissions continue to grow
content: We are required, under the Paris Agreement, to submit new NDCs covering the period up to 2035. We have confirmed that we will be doing so soon. Ideally, the new NDCs should be part of an economy-wide… [+6583 chars]
